name: Tower of Slime
description:
You are a small slime, absorbing all kinds of objects to make it to the top of the tower. Why you ask? Well, because an even bigger white void wants to absorb you!

How to play

Arrow keys/ WASD to aim, hold and release space to jump. 

Eat/Absorb objects to gain points and restore energy.

The movement system is pretty broken,  broken as in you can fling yourself really hard off of corners.

The Web version is even more broken, because parts of the level don't get loaded in on time!!! Also looks like i accidentally gave 200 points upon death smh.

Even tough that was to be expected, knowing this is my first jam and quite possibly first somewhat actual public game
